content.detailedDescription: During winter after christmas of 1967, i, my brother and a friend were deer hunting about 8 miles south of my parent's house, which is located at 19497 buckhorn camp road, prairie grove, ar, 72753-9270. there was only a slight glimmer of pink color in the dawn sky. me, my brother and friend were facing a small pond on a hill overlooking a 40 acre pasture directly south with a view of an area located as: north:35 deg.47'1.69"n; south 35 deg.,45'33.95"n; east: 94 deg.,22'29.25"w and west: 94 deg24'17.40"w (google earth image overlay). my brother said "look" and we looked to the northeast (in the direction of the sefor breeder reactor). we saw a blue round "energy field" surrounding the craft and the field was tapering behind the craft to form a "tear drop" shape. as the craft passed in front of us, it flipped from the round side to the disc-shaped side. as the craft revealed its saucer profile, we saw another disc shaped craft directly below the one that we first observed and they seemed to be only 20 feet apart in formation (one in perfect order on top of the other). as the rotation was complete, the blue field ceased (as if turning off a light bulb). we could see features on the discs that appeared to be a sort of large "windshield" on front and a round window port on the top and another round window port to the area of the disc opposite of the side that the windshield was located. the discs flew about 200 feet over the treetops at the south end of the pasture directly to our south and then to the bottom of a small valley to our southwest. i believe the discs were traveling at 200-300 miles per hour. we saw a the blue field flash again as the discs appeared to make a landing in the valley (locals called the valley "possum holler" as this is a small valley about one mile northeast of an area on the topographic map named "odom" on the evansville quadrangle, section #28 near garrett hollow). as i was telling my brother and friend that i'd like to go see where the discs landed, they were running toward the pickup truck and i became afraid too. when we got home, we told my dad about the ufo. he called the air force. the  officer who answered the phone told my dad that what we saw could be a reflection of the moon off the clouds. my dad told the officer that it was new moon, so there was no moon. the officer said that maybe what we saw was an ignition of swamp gas. my dad told them that we are in the mountains and there are no swamps. the officer then said it may be a weather balloon and my dad told them that no weather balloon has a blue energy field that shuts off and on. my dad told the officer that he was just lying and making up stuff. the officer would not talk any more, so my dad hung up on him.
content.summary: Saw ufo, saucer-shaped, with companion saucer.

content.detailedDescription: I know that people have been seeing star-like things very often because i've been reading the ufo stalker reports. well, i beleive it was november. there was'nt any snow in a little while, which gave me a clue to what time it was. it was definitly 2008. honestly, i don't remember what the day was, because i don't keep track of that. i was really angry at myself because of it. me, my younger sister and my mother were getting out of our toyota bennet camry. i think we came back maybe from my uncle's house, not entirely sure. i was on my front porch and i was looking at the night sky admiring it's beauty. i looked at the moon, and then i saw the constellation orion, i saw his belt, his legs and feet, and his body, and i believe i may have seen his head. i then noticed a star. this star was slightly larger than the others. maybe in finger comparison, less than a milla inch. except, what caught my attention was that..... it was moving. i began staring at in awe. i thought to myself, "what is that... is it a..." i thought it was a meteor at first. but from my knowledge, meteors aren't blue. then i noticed that it sortove left a white sortove misty trail behind. it wasn't completely covering the portion of space. i could lightly see black behind it. then i began to believe it was a ufo. my mother veiwed the object also. i only remember her saying, "it does'nt seem like an airplace..." she does'nt believe in extra terrestrials. i do though. i've believed all my live. i believe my sister was there, but she keep's saying she does'nt remember. i don't remember her saying anything about the object. i then went inside and began veiwing it with my 10 by 8 binoculars. i noticed no features on it. no lines or arks. then, it began moving in a backward direction. when it went over the mist, the mist began to dissappear. i began watching discovery channel, ( i don't remember what was on)mighte have been mythbusters, then after 1 episode was completed, i looked outside again, and the object was gone. i looked b=for it for about 7 minutes. after the expirenence i began having nightmares about seeing aliens, ufo's, being attacked by white beams of light, and skinny, tall being's with long fingers touching my forhead. i asked my mother if i could take a picture of the object with her t mobile razor phone. she refused. thank you for letting people be able to share their expirences with you. please believe me on this one. i have no mental or phyisical poblems. i'm not insane. to be honest, i still attend a middle school. i have nothing to gain by posting this.
content.summary: a blue colored light slowly moving and leaving a trail behind in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 20:00 and i wanted to watch the moon with my telescope i noticed a white orb next to the moon i thought it was venus but it was bigger.I knew something is not right about it and than after several minutes it started fading and it was gone only black sky on the place where it was standing.I noticed the same thing 3 days after that again near the moon and it just faded again i never saw it again.I felt really interested about it i was just watching it and forgot to picture it and i am feeling  sad now because i did not took a picture of it.
content.summary: Circle of white light.

content.detailedDescription: Out in the back field taking pictures of the sun setting and found this picture, i did not see it with the naked eye it was only when i started to look at the pictures and found this one picture with the object in the sky no other pictuers taken of that same area has the object
content.summary: Glowing 3d circle.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in west chicago attending the severe weather seminar at fermilab. we took a break at intermission, and stepped outside to stretch our legs(my girlfriend and i). we both noticed a bright light to the northwest of our position next to fermilab. i thought that on this clear evening i could situate the object in one of the constellations; being an astronomy fan. the light was not one of the bright stars of gemini, taurus, or orion. to my dismay, i looked back to find the light, and it faed down in size, as though it were departing at high speed, leaving only a small light in the extreme distance.

my friend and i were wondering at what we had just seen, when we noticed the light had returned in the same position, just as bright as originally.
as we continued to look and speculate (because i've been a long time ufo fan also.) the light receded in size once again; causing us both to gasp in dismay. 

in weeks following, i talked to my pastor (now deceased) who had been a longtime science teacher before becoming a minister. as a scientist, he considered himself a ufo skeptic, and he referred us to the planetarium, and the u of i astronomy dept. we received explanations of either venus (i knew it wasn't.) satellites catching sunlight as they came over the horizon at that time of the evening (this object showed no progression across the sky, as other satellites i've seen.) or meteors. (i've seen many shooting stars in my 54 yrs.

i just wanted to see if anyone else reported something during this same time period, only a few months before the famous incident of nov. '06.
content.summary: Bright light in northwest sky that suddenly reduced in size, only to reappear, and fade out again.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving that night to watch a softball game. i was driving along a straight road and i noticed that there were three to four white lights in the sky right above the horizon.At first i thought it was a helicopter but then i noticed the lights looked as they were in a disc shape. the lights moved to the center of the road and i was getting closer(about 100 yards), as i got closer the object went into a field to the right of the roadvery quickly and swiftly. as i was passing by the field i looked for the lights and caught a glimpse of them and also a flashing red light at the top. i never stopped to get a closer look because there was no way to get off the road.
content.summary: Saw disc-shaped ufo while driving.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family went on vacation on ohrid lake.Our friends had rented a house so we went to visit them my family and the friends were sitting on a table near the house.I went to the garage to see whats inside when i came out i saw a flying saucer over the trees the house was far from other houses  so it was all trees around us no lights and glowing stuff.So i saw this orange flying saucer over the trees coming down it was far away not that far away i saw it it was big and landing it was over the trees so in about 3 seconds it was behind them somewhere.
content.summary: I saw orange ufo.

content.detailedDescription: My five month old daughter awoke me with crying at approximately 5:41 am. i rolled over in bed to feed her and saw the object out of the corner of my eye. i thought it was the planet venus or a large star, but it was too close and too low to be a star. it moved form the top of the foothills upward, then over my home , out to the eastern plains. it was large and glowing like a star. there was no flashing, like airplane lights. i ran outside to watch it. there was no sound at all. i expected to hear something. i watched it until i could not see it anymore. the sun came up soon after. i am up all the time gazing out my window towards the west and i have never seen anything like this before. it seemed as close as a small airplane, but as large as a venus in the night sky. its' brightness and speed were consistently the same over the two minute period.
content.summary: Large, bright, silent , star like object moving from the west .

content.detailedDescription: Driving north towards ft.Myers fl. i noticed a thin cylinder shape moving oddly north east. i live in chicago between midway and ord so this was not a plane.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White cylinder

content.detailedDescription: After coming back from a late lunch to my office, i noticed what appeared to be a bright star or light in the eastern portion of the sky.  i work in a camera store, so i grabbed a canon video hidef video camera and filmed the object for several minutes.  once i got a fix on the object and zoomed in, it appeared to be diamond shaped.  it's coloring was a translucent pinkish blue and white.  i thought it could be a reaction to the auto focus of the camera.  so i zoomed in and out several times, but the object always kept the same shape.  after zooming out one last time, i couldn't find it again, and the bright light in the eastern part of the sky was gone.
content.summary: Bright star like object in the north eastern portion of the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Esto ocurrio en entre el mes de julio o agoste de el a������o 2000 en la ciudad de comodoro rivadavia provincia de el chubut argentina, yo en ese momento trabajaba en una tienda de ropa y  en ese momento me encontraba  afuera de el local  con 4 amigos mirando en direccion oeste a un hotel llamado comodoro que se encuentra a una cuadra de distancia ( detras de este se  encuentra otro edificio luego una calle e inmediatamente despues a unos 20 metros el oceano atlantico )y en ese momento veo el objeto en forma de cigarro de color plateado que pasa por detras de el edificio , a una velocidad relativamente lenta y a una distancia de mas o menos 800 metros de este o sea que este se encuetra a la altura de el mar, pensando que era un avion "raro" le digo a mis amigos en broma "miren un ovni" y de en ese momento cuando ellos se dan vuelta de este "cigarro" y desde abajo de el sale un objeto menor tambien plateado el cual en segundos de vuelve muy luminoso y de el cual emergen muchas chispas hacia atras de el mismo, en ese momento comienza a girar en derredor de el objeto mayor a gran velocidad y en ese momento el objeto mayor comienza a incrementar su velocidad y se dirije hacia el mar mientras que el objeto menor pareciera ser como si fuera el generador de su velocidad.
con mis amigos salimos corriendo para llegar al mar para seguir viendolo(porque para ese momento los edificios de en frente ya nos lo tapaban).Al llegar a la orilla de el mar ya el objeto se veia muy peque������o y estaba muy lejos pero podiamos verlo por su brillo a la distncia por unas segundos mas, en ese momento nos dimos cuenta que el transito de esa calle se habia detenido por este suceso y habia generado una larga cola de veiculos incluso habia gente que habia salido de sus veiculos, me acuedo que ese dia era sabado porque en frente de el local en que yo trabajaba habia una casa de fotografia y cuando quisimos avisar para que saquen fotos estaba cerrado y por desgracia en esa epoca no tenia celulares con camara..Un dia o dos despues en el canal local transmitieron un video de un aficionado que mostraba en su vecindario un especie de burbuja de luz de no mas de un metro de diametro que recorria las calles de su barrio a baja altura y con conocido me entere que tambian lo habian visto en la ruta a cia una ciudad vecina y luego se lo vio en una ciudad llamada caleta olivia en la provincia de santa cruz a unos 100 km.
en la primera foto mueto en verde el lugar donde nos encotrabamos con mis amigos y el recorrido que seguimos para seguie el objeto , en azul se encuentra el edificio de el cual lo vi salir por detras y en rojo el recorrido de el objeto,
en la segunda foto un dibujo de el mismo
content.summary: Un cigarro plateado del que se desprende un fireball y gira a su alrededor.

content.detailedDescription:
Esto ocurrio en entre el mes de julio o agoste de el a������o 2000 en la ciudad de comodoro rivadavia provincia de el chubut argentina, yo en ese momento trabajaba en una tienda de ropa y  en ese momento me encontraba  afuera de el local  con 4 amigos mirando en direccion oeste a un hotel llamado comodoro que se encuentra a una cuadra de distancia ( detras de este se  encuentra otro edificio luego una calle e inmediatamente despues a unos 20 metros el oceano atlantico )y en ese momento veo el objeto en forma de cigarro de color plateado que pasa por detras de el edificio , a una velocidad relativamente lenta y a una distancia de mas o menos 800 metros de este o sea que este se encuetra a la altura de el mar, pensando que era un avion "raro" le digo a mis amigos en broma "miren un ovni" y de en ese momento cuando ellos se dan vuelta de este "cigarro" y desde abajo de el sale un objeto menor tambien plateado el cual en segundos de vuelve muy luminoso y de el cual emergen muchas chispas hacia atras de el mismo, en ese momento comienza a girar en derredor de el objeto mayor a gran velocidad y en ese momento el objeto mayor comienza a incrementar su velocidad y se dirije hacia el mar mientras que el objeto menor pareciera ser como si fuera el generador de su velocidad.

en la primera foto mueto en verde el lugar donde nos encotrabamos con mis amigos y el recorrido que seguimos para seguie el objeto , en azul se encuentra el edificio de el cual lo vi salir por detras y en rojo el recorrido de el objeto,
en la segunda foto un dibujo de el mismo
content.summary: Un cigarro plateado del que se desprende un fireball y gira a su alrededor,

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on i 99 toward east freedom pa. i saw a triangle shaped craft moving from west to east very quickly. it came over the mountain to my left across the valley in a few seconds. it crossed the highway and went over the ridge to my right.It was not moving any faster then a jet. however, it was much lower than normal aircraft would fly to the mountains.It was dark and hard to judge but when i aw it clear the mountain i looked down the ridge to the bottom of the valley and judged the craft was 500 to 600 feet above the ridge line. i looked several times to see if i could see it more but it was gone.The craft had three lights on it. the front light was green. one each side of the side were sevral white lights shaped in a triangle. it happened very quickly and i can not say if it was 5or 6 lights on each side shaped in a triangle on each end of the triangle. i do not know what i saw it happened quickly and i was driving up the interstate.
content.summary: Low flying large triangle shaped craft moving west to east.

content.detailedDescription:
I observed a large retangular object stationary in the night sky the object was very bright. it appeared to be a docking platform. there were object's approaching from both directions. they would stop momentarily then depart this platform. i told my teacher about this event the next day. she replied," billy you observed something very special." my uncle marvin morris observed an object land in a field just outside of rutland,ohio at about the same time frame. my brother gene stephenson informed me that he along with other residence of middleport, ohio obserevd a traingle shape object in the night sky and chased after it in their cars.


i've had nightmares about being chase by ufo's and i couldn't hide. i'm a retired philadelphia police detective and a retired intelligence specialist chief petty officer.

thank you'

[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Bright objects in the sky, one retangular

content.detailedDescription: I was letting the cat in and saw 2 very bright lights, one in front of the other flying toward me. they were going the same speed and rather slow so i thought they were connected and if they were this thing was massive. at the same time both lights turned into 2 lights, it was getting closer and closer. i yelled for my daughter to wake up, she grumpily came to look. we watched the first one fly past and behind the house but the second one turned on 4 more lights totaling 6 horizontal lights. awestruck we watched this thing turn completely right on a dime, it was now traveling right towards us over head. all 6 lights then turned red. we watched as 5 red lights on a long rectangular shape thing fly overhead. i could make out a rectangle shape due to the illumination of the red lights. the speed was quite slow. after it flew over our heads i watched this massive rectangular strip of red lights fly over the nearby mountain. it was incridible. there was no noise at all. it was about 15 degrees crystal clear sky moon was crescent and behind the house. this thing came from the south east. what the hell were these craft.
content.summary: Long rectangle row of red and white lights on 2 craft.

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo is in sky far distant away it appears to be a star that changes color rapidly. i'm laying in bed in a loft at a friends house with large sky light above me i start watching this object move at first i thought it was a helicopter but it was making 90 degree turns then it moves up higher in the sky stops changes colors to look like star sat there for about 45 minutes then suddenly came lower down stopped and went back to looking like star again for about 15 minutes then slowly moved out of sight the way it moved was not in a strait line more like a drunk driver.

few days later i went out in to a nearby sand pit and watched the sky and saw an object that was slowly changing color and was like making odd turns again it look as if it can not go in a strait line then it went out of sight.

i could tell you more of these types of sighting if you want me to.

i was wondering if you have heard anything about this sighting in franklin me

the first sighting i listed here was seen from the donnel pond rd 

the other sighting was seen from thee franklin sand and gravel pit

off of the black woods rd

mike
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Ufo appears and "hides" moves and disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just exited the t in harvard square, and turned the corner on to mt. auburn st., when a shine caught my eye. i looked up, and saw what looked like a silver boomerang totally still, high up in the sky. i blinked because i thought my eyes were blurry, then turned around and saw the moon and a star (below it) very clearly...I turned back around, and the object was still there. it stayed completely still, and was shinier on the right side than the left. an airplane came from behind where i was standing, and flew low and beneath it, and i slowly realized my eyes were not playing tricks on me...The object was absolutely still and remained in the exact spot, with a slight haze around it. 
at first, i thought it was my eyes that were blurry and i simply didn't believe what i was seeing. i turned around, checked my eyes, and returned to still see it, and stared in disbelief. i felt scared, overwhelmed and sad all at once. i thought i should call someone or grab a stranger and point it out, but it took me telling someone else about it to begin to realize how real it was. it took hours for the event to actually sink in, and it feels unreal. i drew a picture...I wish i could've captured it on film. i actually can't do justice to how i feel right now...I had to search for somewhere to tell someone, and found this site. 
after probably a minute and a half, i turned the corner to my apartment, and when i looked back to check and see if it was still there, it was gone. it was there, then it disappeared. this happened at twilight, a quarter to 6pm, in a clear, cloudless sky.
content.summary: Silver boomerang object, slightly shiny on right side, hovering high in the sky west of cambridge, ma.

content.detailedDescription:
My question is that i have always wondered about what happened to me and a friend when we where out deerhunting one morning. 

this would have been in sept./oct. 1976 and would have been early morning before daylight. we where sitting in the timber sitting against a tree. my friend was sittingabout 30 feet from me when all of a sudden this bright light was shining down upon us and when i looked upit was blinding so i looked away. 

i never disgused it with him and have lost contact withhim after that. i do not remember what happened otherthan all of a sudden it was daylight and we startedhunting for deer.  i do not know what happened for at least that halfhour. i have not had any nightmares or anythingbut just curious if any one else you have had contact with had any experince like this. 

this happened in missouri about 7 miles south of green city, mo. it was a clear crisp night. i have always wondered about it and actually had forgottenabout it till the last few years when i started watchingthe history channel and then the show on wed. nights.
content.summary: Did not see ship.

content.detailedDescription: This picture was taken at notre dame elementary school, located in new hyde park, long island, new york, on the first day of school, which should be monday, the 4th of september, 1972. time is estimated to be around 8 to 9am.  sky is clear, weather appears to be comfortable, no evidence of wind in the picture, sun is rising from the east, causing long morning shadows.  mothers are seen talking amongst themselves and with teachers, their kids are lined up waiting to enter the school.  located at the center top of the photograph, right above a tree, appears to be a silver, saturn shaped ufo, banking either asending towards the left, or decending toward the right.  this is based on optical features (shadows?) shown on the ufo.  i am no optical expert, however it does seem to be evident from normal viewing that one branch from the top of the tree is showing to be blocking the view of the lower left rim of the ufo.  if this is the case, this object would be truly quite large.  nobody in the schoolyard appears to notice or hear the object, however, considering the social environment, this may be understandable.  i don������t know what kind of camara was used, but it surly was not digital.  this object does not look like the moon in any circumstance imo.  what is needed is some serious optical analysis to rule out traditional ifos.  remember, this is 1972.  there were no commercially available aluminum helium balloons for kids at the time.  nearest airports are la guardia airport, located about 12 miles to the wnw of new hyde park and jfk, located about 10 miles to the sw.  this area of nassau county is a high air traffic area.  i doubt official weather balloons would be released under such air traffic conditions.
content.summary: Possible saturn shaped ufo shown banking over new hyde park, long island in september, 1972 photo.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on the western kentucky parkway leaving central city, ky towards madisonville, ky at 7:15pm cst, march 3,2009.  this is about a 30 minute drive and the parkway is not well lit and very dark.  i noticed a very bright light in the western sky.  when i first noticed it, it appeared out of place.  i thought that maybe it was a planet in the night sky however i have never seen a planet so low.  as i watched the light i tried to see if it would move maybe being a helicopter or low flying plane.  the object was not moving and appeared to hover the right side of the parkway.  the light was as bright as a street light and rather large. this really got my curiousity up.  i was traveling around 65 mph and could see it from the right side of my windshield.  it never blinked or changed colors.  about 15 minutes of watching this object it appeared to slowly change sides of the parkway.  it then hovered on the left side of the parkway for a few minutes and returned to the right side.  watching the object as i drove, i noticed that it suddenly began to get smaller, smaller, smaller, until it disappeared in the sky.  i couldnt explain what it was or what i had just witnessed.  i had never seen anything like this before in my 50 years of life.  it was odd enough to catch my attention and strange enough to keep me watching until it was gone.  i felt very uneasy as i continued to drive to henderson, ky.  i watched the sky as i drove home but never saw the object again.
content.summary: Stationary very bright light in the western sky after dark.

content.detailedDescription: One evening my mom, myself and my best friend were in the driveway of my grandparents home. we were enjoying the nice weather and looking up at the stars. if you look at the first picture, imagine the three of us facing away from the house & looking toward the field. as we had our heads tilted slightly toward the sky to stargaze a bizarre object came into view from behind. naturally, we tilted our heads back further & further to get a better view of what was above us. a smooth, silver, disc-shaped object that was approximately 4 times the size of my grandparents house was slowly moving over our heads. it was only about 20 feet above the house (which is 2-story) and made absolutely no sound at all. the three of us were in complete awe of this magnificent sight. the craft was so smooth that it appeared to be made of an almost fluid-like metal. completely lining the edge all the way around the disc were the most beautiful white lights. it was a shade of white that i have never seen in my entire life, and to this day i still can not explain the incredible luminescence of the lights. as bright as the lights were, one would expect to be temporarily blinded, but we didn���t need to shield our eyes at all. the craft hovered silently over us and slowly made it���s way across the street. once it reached the field that you see in the second picture it stopped completely and just sat for a moment. all of a sudden the large ship shot straight into the air with lightning speed and separated into three pieces going in three different directions. for nearly 15 years after that (until my next and subsequent encounters) i had never experienced anything in my life that allowed me to feel so at peace... so complete... so safe... so loved. there wasn���t a single part of me that was scared that night, as many people imagine they would be in a situation like that. i suppose it���s just something that nobody could ever truly fathom unless they experience for themself.
content.summary: Silver, disc-shaped ufo with lights all around edge.

content.detailedDescription: See attached photographs
content.summary: Unusual lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I decided to visit a friend who lives up the street from me. as i stepped out of the house with my son and girlfriend, i looked up in the sky and noticed a bright, round object in the sky. i looked to my girlfriend and asked she if she knew what it was. she said no. we continued up the street and i decided to look back to see if it was still there. it was still there, but higher in the sky. we got to our destination a few minutes later.
..About 2 hours later we left our friends house, looked into the sky and it was gone! stars don't move like that!?
..The next day, after dark, another friend came over. we went out to smoke a cigarette, and i went around the corner of my house to look to the sky to see if it was still there. my friend looked at me and "oh, you saw that too?" i said "saw what?" and then he described exactly what i had seen the night before. him and his girlfriend had witnessed the object moving back and forth in the sky.
..Was not a star, plane, balloon, bird, or any other government explanation. 
..Anyone else from ohio see the object?
content.summary: Disc shaped, very bright.

content.detailedDescription: Looking west from i-80 and 60st in omaha, ne 1950h -2000h cst. observed a fixed unwavering yellow globe of light at approx. 45 degrees above horizon. as i continued west the light very slowly moved south. for approx. 15 degrees. the light changed from yellow to white and appeared to diminish in size at the same position until it disappeared. weather was slightly hazy to clear and no clouds noted. i did not see any aircraft running lights or any aircraft in the area.
content.summary: Unknown light viewed 10 min. western sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I took more pictures of an area i  have been photographing for 3 years.  i uploaded it to google picasa 
http://picasaweb.Google.Com/lh/photo/wapmjvwsfg55djmhkuczxw?Feat=directlink 
so that anyone can view the album.
content.summary: More pictures from pearisburg, va.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving from work and noticed aircraft taking off from lax and veering left over the pacific. at that time i noticed a very bright object that was seemed to fly, stop and disappear. it was brighter than the aircraft in the distance. i watched it for about five minutes and then it disappeared once more and didn't reappear. 

from so la cienega blvd and looking west, i spotted a very bright object that seemed to dart diagonally, disappear and reappear and dart again. it reminded me of a bat catching insects.
content.summary: A very bright light dashed diagonally and seemed to disappear and reappear.

content.detailedDescription: Charleston harbor, on the james island connector. went to pick a friend up from his work downtown,  my son and i took the trip...Noticed a strange cloud all by itself  unlike a storm cloud  this one came overhead and parked itself right over the battery park...Heh...It was huge  easily larger than downtown charleston proper...It wouldnt be all that unusual to see a rain type cloud over us, really but it was  a beautiful sunny afternoon,  no clouds   pretty clear.  i watch the air traffic around here and it seems pretty normal and patterned.  i was in the military during the gulfwar  and worked with many aircraft.   its a fascination!  my son shares the same fascination ...So you can imagine our surprise...We said nothing to each other about it really.  on the way back from downtown,  we drove up the connector,  and i asked my friend  and my son if the weird cloud is still there, as i was merging and couldnt take my eyes of my mirrors...Driving safe ya know!   i got situated and looked up to see...  well...Its  now kinda obvious from this angle thats  there is something in that dark smokey gray cloud,  it appears to have a saucer with a rather huge chrome frontend.Very thick  maybe 200 feet  thick  tall and a square half mile in diameter..But the cloud seems to be drafting and produced a rolling smoky front edge...Weird kinda gave away its "cloak" we all were totally glued to it...I had to pull over.    i couldnt,  traffic was mad that day...We went home...We dont talk about it,  but i know we are being visited...It could be one of ours...Or....
content.summary: We've all seen what a cloud looks like? right? a cloud with something in it, shaped like a fat saucer, with chrome edges, floating in a cloud, a stormy gray silver unlike a real cloud.

content.detailedDescription: I took these photo���s on 26 february 2009, in philadelphia, pa. i was trying to prove that you can make out an object in the sky taken with cheap (iphone) technology. i wanted to know why these ufo photos are always so grainy and suspect. and thought,  if you practiced shooting planes and helicopters with decent equipment, you should get a pretty good picture.    as i stepped out of my work place that day, i saw a copter hovering above the expressway and decided to test my idea. 2 days later while watching ufo hunters i remembered the photos. to my surprise i had captured these other objects.  one directly above the copter, the other to the left at about 11:00. i took 2 shots one after the other.   i thought it might be a bird at first, but it should be smaller than the copter.  or a plane taken at an angle, that distorted its characteristics, could be!  22 years in the navy and 5 aircraft carriers, i think i should be able to tell the difference.  so what do you guys think.
content.summary: Did not see them in the sky, only after viewing the pictures did i spot them.

content.detailedDescription: Luminous disc shows up on this blue hill web cam photo.. i've seen many light patterns on these cams but none like this.       webcamufo.Com
content.summary: Luminous disc shows up on this blue hill web cam photo..        webcamufo.Com

content.detailedDescription: I had stepped outside onto my patio to smoke a cigarette.  i was looking up at the sky, it was a very clear night and the stars were beautiful. as i was looking off into the distance i noticed a flashing light. at first glance it kind of looked like a plane so i was too bothered about it��� but when it started to get closer i couldn���t hear it. now i���m confused. here is this massive airplane flying over my apartment complex and it���s completely quiet. at that point i had called for my fianc��� to come take a look at this. as it got closer you could clearly see 5 white lights and one lonesome red one. it was eerie��� this object with five lights just slowly moved across the sky until it eventually faded out completely. my camera didn���t catch all of the detail i was hoping it might; my camera isn���t the best camera. this object was huge; it was the size of the apartment building i live in (if not bigger). i am thankful that i had enough sense to grab my video camera before the craft disappeared. the duration of this event only lasted about a couple minutes; i caught the first 48 second on film.
content.summary: It was huge, it flew right over my apartment complex. it was bigger than my apartment building!
